name: Hill Valley High School
description: The imposing red-brick facade of Hill Valley High School stands as a monument to teenage angst, budding romances, and, famously, the very spot where a timid George McFly found his courage and delivered a legendary punch to the perpetually menacing Biff Tannen. The echoes of lockers slamming, school bells ringing, and perhaps even a faint 'Hey, McFly!' seem to linger in the air.
